config_path.description: Path to the appgate config file. Can be set with APPGATE_CONFIG_PATH.

exempted_users.description: The MFA provider ID to use during Multi-Factor Authentication. If null, Admin MFA is disabled.

provider_id.description: The MFA provider ID to use during Multi-Factor Authentication. If null, Admin MFA is disabled.

notes.description: Notes for the object. Used for documentation purposes.

connect_to_peers_using_client_port_with_.description: Makes the Appliance to connect to Controller/LogServer/LogForwarders using their clientInterface.httpsPort instead of peerInterface.httpsPort. The Appliance uses SPA to connect.

notes.description: Notes for the object. Used for documentation purposes.

site.description: Site served by the Appliance. Entitlements on this Site will be included in the Entitlement Token for this Appliance. Not useful if Gateway role is not enabled.

https_ciphers.description: The type of TLS ciphers to allow. See: https://www.openssl.org/docs/man1.0.2/apps/ciphers.html for all supported ciphers.

proxy_protocol.description: To enable/disable Proxy protocol on this Appliance.

profiles.description: Names of the profiles in this Collective to use in the Portal.

file.description: Path to the appliance customization binary.

notes.description: Notes for the object. Used for documentation purposes.

remedy_logic.description: Whether all the Remedy Methods must succeed to pass this Condition or just one.

expression.description: A JavaScript expression that returns boolean.

file.description: Path to the Device Script binary.

filename.description: The name of the file to be downloaded as to the client devices.

conditions.description: List of Condition IDs applies to this Entitlement.

notes.description: Notes for the object. Used for documentation purposes.

expression.description: A JavaScript expression that returns a list of IPs and names.

notes.description: Notes for the object. Used for documentation purposes.

administration_token_expiration.description: Number of minutes the administration Token is valid for administrators.

app_discovery_domains.description: Domains to monitor for for App Discovery feature.

backup_api_enabled.description: Whether the backup API is enabled or not.

backup_passphrase.description: The passphrase to encrypt Appliance Backups when backup API is used.

claims_token_expiration.description: Number of minutes the Claims Token is valid both for administrators and clients.

collective_id.description: A randomly generated ID during first installation to identify the Collective.

entitlement_token_expiration.description: Number of minutes the Entitlement Token is valid for clients.

geo_ip_updates.description: Whether the automatic GeoIp updates are enabled or not.

has_backup_passphrase.description: Whether there is a backup passphrase set or not. Deprecated as of 5.0. Use backupApiEnabled instead.

login_banner_message.description: The configured message will be displayed on the login UI.

message_of_the_day.description: The configured message will be displayed after a successful logging.

profile_hostname.description: Client Connections, The hostname to use for generating profile URLs.

vpn_certificate_expiration.description: Number of minutes the VPN certificates is valid for clients.

network_subnets.description: Network subnets in CIDR format to define the Site's boundaries. They are added as routes by the Client.

short_name.description: A short 4 letter name for the site

web_proxy_enabled.description: Flag for manipulating web proxy p12 file. Setting this false will delete the existing p12 file from database.

web_proxy_key_store.description: The PKCS12 package to be used for web proxy. The file must be with no password and must include the full certificate chain and a private key. In Base64 format.

web_proxy_verify_upstream_certificate.description: Gateway will verify the certificate of the endpoints.

seed_file.description: Seed file (json) generated from appliance used in remote-exec.

pem.description: Get the current CA Certificate in PEM format.
